actions.desc: The burrowling makes one bite attack and one claw attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Sling

special_abilities.desc: A burrowling gets advantage on Perception checks if at least one other burrowling is awake within 10 feet.
special_abilities.name: Burrow Awareness

special_abilities.desc: The burrowling has advantage on attack rolls when its target is adjacent to at least one other burrowling that's capable of attacking.
special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
